verbs.description: cognosce (third-person singular simple present cognosces, present participle cognoscing, simple past and past participle cognosced)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To determine a person to be insane or mentally incompetent.
examples: […]  directing him to enquire whether the Person sought to be Cognosced is Insane, who is his nearest Agnate, and whether such Agnate is of lawful age  […]

entries.meaning: (law, Scotland) To examine; to give judgment.
